Wingchuner thanks for you effort for uploadingthis movie.

ok update on this movie only quicktime 7 (not quicktime 6.5) can play this file but you'll only get to view half  a screen .  To view fullscreen you need to upgrade to PRO 7 version.
Yes that's right you have to pay.  Well screw that I'm not downloading any more MP4.

Ok first of all its not a corrupt file...jesus you paranoid people...second of all try vlc player/mplayer/quicktime before asking what player do i use? there are also serials for quicktime so you really don't have to pay for them, besides if your downloading a movie from here, i doubt your paying for a lot of software  now n days
